member.name: T:WCSharp.Dummies.DummySystem
member.summary: Tracks and recycles all dummy units on the map. Will automatically create more if necessary.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Dummies.DummySystem.RecycleDummy(War3Api.Common.unit,System.Single)
member.summary: Call this when you are done with a dummy. The dummy will become available for use again after the .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Dummies.DummySystem.GetDummy(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,War3Api.Common.player)
member.summary: Requests an available dummy at the given coordinates and under control of the given player.
